local_intent: Verify precise alignment to the bin lid by re-perceiving the bin, moving to a safe pre-grasp, retrying ApproachAndAlign (tolerance 0.01), then setting and checking yaw at 90°.
assumptions: Yaw 90° is a suitable orientation for engaging the bin lid edge.
Offset_z 0.10 m is collision-safe above the bin.
coherence_with_global: Follows the global perceive→move-above→align flow using the same targets/params, adds a bounded retry on alignment and an orientation set/verify step to prepare for the subsequent OpenContainer action.
